attributes.action: Make social distancing mandatory today to prevent further spread of COVID19
attributes.additional_details:
Maths don't lie - COVD19 is spreading faster in the UK and the government is not acting accordingly to this pandemic. 
We must learn from Italy and China example and don't make the same mistakes. 
This virus is spreading fast and we need a competent government to act faster to avoid the situation that Italy is facing.  

The UK already reached the growth rate of cases between 3/5 and 3/5 this means the cases will be double every 2 days
Source https://medium.com/@tomaspueyo/coronavirus-act-today-or-people-will-die-f4d3d9cd99ca

ACT NOW !
attributes.background: We would like the government to start taking this virus more seriously and start making a mandatory requirement to work from home, close schools, colleges and universities as well as forcing the cancellation of public events and gatherings to prevent further spread.
